name: green-hydrogen-subsidy-system
description: Smart contract-based system for automated green hydrogen subsidy disbursement

scripts.build: npm run build:contracts && npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.deploy:contracts: cd contracts && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy.js --network localhost
scripts.deploy:contracts:testnet: cd contracts && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy.js --network sepolia
scripts.test: npm run test:contracts && npm run test:backend
scripts.setup: npm run setup:contracts && npm run setup:backend && npm run setup:frontend

author: Green Hydrogen Development Team
